claims.claim: Tech companies gather thousands of times more data than traditional insurers, producing nuanced customer profiles and remarkably predictive insights
claims.quote: Tech companies gather thousands of times more data than traditional insurers, producing nuanced profiles of their customers, and remarkably predictive insights.

claims.claim: AI will enable insurance companies to quantify risk like never before through digital data collection
claims.quote: Act 1 showcases the power of technology to transform any business by reducing costs, increasing speed, and delighting consumers. But when Act 2 begins, we will see the power of AI to transform insurance in a uniquely powerful way. It will go beyond thrilling customers and driving efficiencies, to being able to quantify risk like never before.

claims.claim: Lemonade reached 1 million customers in just 4 years compared to 20+ years for traditional insurers
claims.quote: Lemonade has managed in just 4 years to reach the figure of 1 million customers when other companies of the size of GEICO, Allstate or Statefarm needed more than 20 years.

claims.claim: Lemonade is the first choice for first-time renters insurance buyers and second choice for people under 35
claims.quote: And in fact, Lemonade claims to be the first option for 1st-time buyers renters insurance and second for people under 35 years old.

claims.claim: Lemonade signed up over 14,000 customers in just six months, a record for a new Insurtech
claims.quote: Signed up over 14,000 customers in just six months, a record for a new Insurtech.

claims.claim: Cross-selling to renters becoming homeowners cut acquisition costs by 70%
claims.quote: Using lifecycle targeting, they cross-sold to renters becoming homeowners, cutting acquisition costs by 70%.

claims.claim: Lemonade's Automation Index jumped from 5 to 2,500, enabling the same headcount to handle vastly more customers
claims.quote: By 2019, automation became Lemonade's silent growth engine. The Automation Index jumped from 5 to 2,500, enabling the same headcount to handle vastly more customers.

claims.claim: Telematics integration improved auto insurance conversion by ~60%
claims.quote: In 2024, Lemonade transformed its auto business by integrating telematics auto insurance at onboarding, improving conversion by ~60% and pricing accuracy.

claims.claim: By 2025, Lemonade achieved $1.083B in-force premiums with 29% year-over-year growth
claims.quote: By 2025, Lemonade Insurance achieved: In-Force Premiums: $1.083B (+29% YoY)

claims.claim: Lemonade achieved 35% year-over-year revenue growth and doubled gross profit with 39% margins
claims.quote: Revenue: 35% YoY, Gross Profit: More than doubled, with margins at 39%

claims.claim: Lemonade reached positive free cash flow of $25M
Lemonade's revenue grew rapidly from about $128 million in 2021 to about $430 million in 2023
claims.quote: Revenue has grown rapidly: for example from about $128 million in 2021 to about $430 million in 2023.

claims.claim: Lemonade crossed the milestone of more than $1 billion in in-force premiums by 2025
claims.quote: Lemonade has grown from modest beginnings in 2015 into a public company (IPO in 2020) and has crossed key milestones such as more than $1 billion of 'in-force premiums' (IFP) by 2025.
